channel.title: Adding player rights too whether an npc is aggressive towards you
channel.description: its in the title really and i dont know where too begin, the idea is that i have 2 npc's in my staffz zone, and i want them too be aggressive towards non-staff players so thats people with player rights 0, and for them not too be aggressive towards staff players anyone got any idea on how too code this.

ok i understand thank you, i need too go look up everything on NPC based codes and develop it.

item.title: Adding player rights too whether an npc is aggressive towards you
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:262583”] if(player.getRights() == 0) { npc.setAgressive(true); } [/quote]

i love you if that works, could you explain a little more i obviously put that in npchandler but how can i apply it too the 2 npcs i have?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 02:47:17 pm[/size][hr]ill mention im on a delta source too if that helps?
